_note: RESEARCH TOOL — not production orchestration. Synthetic data for Papers 9/25 Figure 1.
_figure: Fig 1 — Monotonic Restriction: permission set comparison across compositions
permission_reduction_narrative: Composing ATP+ASP reduces the initial-state alphabet from 3 actions (ASP alone) to 2 (read, write). Adding AEAP does not reduce further from the initial state since AEAP also permits read and write from 'available'. Monotonic restriction holds: composition never exceeded any single-protocol permission in any joint state.
